p: For C. zedoaria essential oils, the cluster analysis showed two clusters based on dissimilarity ( Figure 3): (1) a cluster dominated by curzerenone/ epi-curzerenone followed by camphor, germacrone, 1,8-cineole, and Î±-copaene; and (2) a cluster represented by a single sample with very large concentrations of 1,8-cineole. The cluster centroids of the main constituents of C. zedoaria rhizome oils are summarized in Table 8.
